code: import React,{useRef}from"react";import'./Experiencia.css';import ExperienceCard from"./ExperieneCard/ExperienceCard";import{EXPERIENCIA_W}from'../../utils/data';import Slider from"react-slick";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Experiencia=()=>{const sliderRef=useRef();const settings={dots:false,infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:2,slidesToScroll:1,arrows:false,responsive:[{breakpoint:769,settings:{slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1}}]};const derecha=()=>{sliderRef.current.slickNext();};const izquierda=()=>{sliderRef.current.slickPrev();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"exp-contenedor",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Work Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"exp-cont",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"arrow-right",onClick:derecha,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-symbols-outlined",children:"chevron_right"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"arrow-left",onClick:izquierda,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-symbols-outlined",children:"chevron_left"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{ref:sliderRef,...settings,children:EXPERIENCIA_W.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperienceCard,{detalles:item},item.title))})]})]});};export default Experiencia;
